english: I am a big fan of domestic products

chinese: 我们保证在三天内将您的包裹送达
english: we guarantee to deliver your package within three days

english: he takes pills as candy out of his mental sickness

chinese: 狗狗鄙视舔自己屁屁的猫
english: the dog despises the cat for licking her ass

chinese: 这只动物有充足的食物来过冬
english: the animal has sufficient food for winter

chinese: 在比赛中，骑手为了赢得胜利，不断鞭策他的马加快速度
english: during the race the rider urged the horse to go faster so he could win

chinese: 他们是我们医院的专家
english: they are the specialists in our hospital

chinese: 政治宣传内容被张贴在城里各处的灯柱上
english: the political propaganda is posted onto the lampposts around the city
it is very hard to endure the toothache

chinese: 那位奢侈的女士花了一大笔钱买这双鞋
english: the extravagant woman spent a large amount of money on the those shoes

chinese: 这件漂亮的衣服太便宜了，我想马上习一件
english: the pretty shirt is so cheap that I want to purchase it at once

english: the sturdy box can easily hold the weight of many books

english: giving blood is 100% voluntary nobody will force you to do it
